name: Mirror world
description: This is an adventure game where a small person carrying a red backpack travels alone to the mysterious and beautiful desert in a world of pixelated wind. He is agile and carries weapons that can defeat strange monsters along the way. In the bottom right corner of the game, there are operation prompts for players. Use the arrow keys to move, the space bar to jump, and the left mouse button to launch weapons. The gameplay is super simple, come and explore this mysterious land!
